favourite.article: Amen! Praise our Lord! Saints, how blessed are we to be part of the Lord's move in this world! May we be built up together in one accord to hasten His return!
It inspires me love God more!!! A saint from PRC.
Thank Lord! Thank Lord for delivering me from sins and dispensing yourself into me so that I can have eternal life! I will fight the holy war for my Lord against the evil spirits of Satan!!!!!
